entities.name: hungarian horntail
entities.description: The Hungarian Horntail is mentioned as a dragon that the school champions would be facing on Tuesday. (Excerpt: 'what deadly dangerous task the sc hool champions would be facing on Tuesday.')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who would be sitting with Harry. (Excerpt: 'Ron would be sitting with him.')

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as the school champion and is described as nervous but excited. (Excerpts: 'Every time he had seen Cedric lately, he ha d been surrounded by admirers and looking nervous but excited.' and '. . . ch eering on Cedric with everyone else...')

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is mentioned as one of the other champions and is described as haughty and unruffled. (Excerpt: 'Harr y glimpsed Fleur Delacour from time to time in the corridors; she looked exactly as she always did, haughty and unruffled.')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who would be watching the champions and cheering on Cedric. (Excerpts: 'He’d have been really  looking forward to it, watching them do whatever it was . . .' and '. . . ch eering on Cedric with everyone else...')

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone Harry would be speaking to. (Excerpt: 'Harry thought of Sirius, and the ti ght, tense knot in his chest seemed to ease slightly.')

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as one of the champions and is described as sitting in the library. (Excerpt: 'A n d  K r u m  j u s t  s a t  i n  t h e  l i b r a r y ,  p o r i n g over books.')
